field_physician_degree.label: Clinical Degrees and Credentials
field_physician_degree.name: physician_degree
field_physician_degree.instructions:
Select the clinical degrees and credentials that allow the provider to practice their form of health care in the state. Select multiple if necessary.

The display order of the items in the provider's name is based on the order of the selected items here. You may click and drag to rearrange the selected items in this field.

field_physician_languages.label: Language(s)
field_physician_languages.name: physician_languages
field_physician_languages.instructions:
This is displayed on the provider's profile if any languages are included other than English. This also enables users to filter the main list of providers by each language.

Be sure to also include English (presuming that is applicable for this provider). Select multiple languages if necessary.

The display order of the selected languages on the provider's profile is based on the order of the selected languages here. You may click and drag to rearrange the selected languages in this field.

field_physician_featured_image.label: Headshot
field_physician_featured_image.name: _thumbnail_id
field_physician_featured_image.instructions:
The photo orientation must be portrait / vertical.

The photo must be high-resolution, preferably not having been resized at all. The minimum dimensions are 1200x1600, but larger is preferred. Do not just increase the size of a smaller image to these dimensions to meet the minimum size.

The image should be a cropped to a 3:4 aspect ratio before uploading. Otherwise, it will automatically be cropped to fit.

The photo should be less than 10 years old.

The provider should be wearing a white coat (if applicable) in front of a white background.

The provider should be facing to the right side of the frame (the provider's left).

field_physician_wide_image.label: Wide Image
field_physician_wide_image.name: physician_image_wide
field_physician_wide_image.instructions: This image will be used for social sharing and Google My Business cover photo. It is restricted to a 16:9 aspect ratio and has a minimum dimension of 1200x675.

field_physician_youtube_link.label: Featured Video
field_physician_youtube_link.name: physician_youtube_link
field_physician_youtube_link.instructions: Select a video from the UAMS YouTube or Vimeo accounts that features this provider and that supports the Patient-focused Clinical Biography. Include the full URL, including https://.

field_physician_podcast_name.label: UAMS Health Talk Podcast Guest Name
field_physician_podcast_name.name: physician_podcast_name
field_physician_podcast_name.instructions: Include a single guest name as listed in the "Guests" dropdown of the embedded player on https://uamshealth.com/podcast/.

field_physician_eligible_appointments.label: Does the Provider See Patients Via Appointments?
field_physician_eligible_appointments.name: physician_eligible_appointments
field_physician_eligible_appointments.instructions: Does the provider see patients via appointments and are those patients appointed to the provider rather than to a resource?

field_physician_primary_care.label: Is the Provider a Primary Care Provider?
field_physician_primary_care.name: physician_primary_care

field_physician_accepting_patients.label: Is the Provider Accepting New Patients?
field_physician_accepting_patients.name: physician_accepting_patients

field_physician_referral_required.label: Does the Provider Require a Referral for New Patients?
field_physician_referral_required.name: physician_referral_required

field_physician_second_opinion.label: Does the Provider Offer Second Opinions?
field_physician_second_opinion.name: physician_second_opinion

field_physician_title.label: Clinical Specialty and Occupational Title
field_physician_title.name: physician_title
field_physician_title.instructions:
The provider's clinical occupation title is defined based on the provider's clinical specialty.

The provider's clinical specialty should be defined according to the primary taxonomy code currently defined by the provider on their National Provider Identifier record in the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System.

The provider's NPI record can be found at https://npiregistry.cms.hhs.gov/search. The taxonomy code(s) will be found at the bottom of the provider's record. The primary taxonomy code will be indicated with a "Yes" in the "Primary Taxonomy" column.

If the primary taxonomy does not reflect the provider's current classification or specialization, contact UAMS Provider Enrollment at enrollment@uams.edu.

Copy the 10-character code for the primary taxonomy from the "Selected Taxonomy" column. Switch back to this provider profile editor. Click this field to open the dropdown. Click the text input area at the top of the dropdown. Paste the primary taxonomy code into that input. Select the clinical specialty that is returned.

If no clinical specialty is returned using the primary taxonomy code, it may be that the primary taxonomy is not valid for our purposes (e.g., it is the taxonomy for a student or for a hospital). Contact UAMS Web Services for guidance.

Find more information about the Clinical Specialty and Occupation Title.

field_physician_service_line.label: UAMS Health Service Line
field_physician_service_line.name: physician_service_line
field_physician_service_line.instructions: If the provider does not belong to a UAMS Health service line, select the relevant option that begins with "None."

field_physician_npi.label: National Provider Identifier (NPI)
field_physician_npi.name: physician_npi
field_physician_npi.instructions:
This value may be found in the provider's UAMS Health Epic SER record. It would be in the "Related Group 9300" item. Look for "Provider NPI" in the column for "9300 - MPI ID TYPE" and copy the value from that row under the "9301 - MPI ID" column.

It may also be found in the UAMS Provider Enrollment Participation Portal, which is only accessible on the UAMS network or by connecting to the UAMS virtual private network.

It may also be found by searching for the provider in the NPPES NPI Registry.

field_physician_pid.label: UAMS Health Epic SER ID
field_physician_pid.name: physician_pid
field_physician_pid.instructions: This value can be found in the provider's UAMS Health Epic SER record under ".1 - ID."

field_physician_patient_types.label: Patient Type(s)
field_physician_patient_types.name: physician_patient_types
field_physician_patient_types.instructions: This is displayed on the provider's profile. This also enables users to filter the main provider list at http://uamshealth.com/provider/ by each patient type.

field_physician_clinical_bio.label: Patient-focused Clinical Biography
field_physician_clinical_bio.name: physician_clinical_bio
field_physician_clinical_bio.instructions:
While this field is not required, it is heavily encouraged.

It should be written with the patient in mind (e.g., What can the provider do for the patient? Why should the patient choose to make an appointment with this provider or with UAMS Health in general?).

Write this from the third-person point of view. Use complete sentences. Use only paragraphs (no headings or lists). Do not use any line breaks, text formatting, images or links.

Move any academic and training background to the "Academic Biography" field, which is under the "Academic Role Details" tab.

field_physician_short_clinical_bio.label: Short Patient-focused Clinical Biography
field_physician_short_clinical_bio.name: physician_short_clinical_bio
field_physician_short_clinical_bio.instructions:
This will be the description included for this page when it appears in search results and in some lists on our site.

Write a short description that generally informs and interests potential patients with a short, relevant summary of this provider and their clinical role. Think of it like a pitch that convinces the potential patient that this provider is exactly who they're looking for.

Follow the instructions used for the longer Patient-focused Clinical Biography field but using a single paragraph with a limit of 160 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

field_physician_clinical_focus.label: Clinical Focus
field_physician_clinical_focus.name: physician_clinical_focus
field_physician_clinical_focus.instructions:
This is displayed alongside the content from the Patient-focused Clinical Biography. It allows you to include a quick glimpse of the provider's main clinical focus in case the content in the Patient-focused Clinical Biography is so long that users may not read the whole thing. This should not be an outline of their services (that is covered by Conditions Treated and Treatments & Procedures).

If you are including the information as a list, use a single-level bulleted list. If you are not including the information as a list, use full sentences in a single paragraph of less than 344 characters.

Do not simply repeat the content of the Patient-focused Clinical Biography.

sub_fields.label: Is the hometown outside the U.S.?
sub_fields.name: physician_resident_hometown_international

sub_fields.label: Medical School
sub_fields.name: physician_resident_school
sub_fields.instructions: The medical school the resident graduated from, not an institution associated with their current residency program

field_physician_academic_appointment.label: Faculty Title
field_physician_academic_appointment.name: physician_academic_appointment
field_physician_academic_appointment.instructions: Both fields are required if you add a row.

sub_fields.label: Title (Original)
sub_fields.name: academic_title
sub_fields.instructions: Deprecated - Moving to select. Please update.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: academic_title_tax
sub_fields.instructions: Professor, Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, etc.

field_physician_academic_admin_title.label: Academic Administrative Title
field_physician_academic_admin_title.name: physician_academic_admin_title
field_physician_academic_admin_title.instructions: Both fields are required if you add a row.

field_physician_profiles_link.label: UAMS Profiles Link
field_physician_profiles_link.name: physician_research_profiles_link
field_physician_profiles_link.instructions: Please include the full URL, including https://

field_pubmed_author_id.label: Pubmed Author ID / Name
field_pubmed_author_id.name: physician_pubmed_author_id
field_pubmed_author_id.instructions: Used to link to Pubmed complete list. Ex. 'Smith JD' More information at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/advanced

field_physician_author_number.label: Number of Latest Articles to Display
field_physician_author_number.name: physician_author_number

field_physician_education_tab.label: Education, Training, Certifications and Memberships

field_physician_appointment_education.label: Education and Training
field_physician_appointment_education.name: physician_education
field_physician_appointment_education.instructions:
Arrange the rows in reverse chronological order, with the most recent item at the top and the oldest item at the bottom.

"Education Type" and "Organization" are both required if you add a row.

sub_fields.label: Organization
sub_fields.name: school
sub_fields.instructions: The organization that provided the education or training to the provider. If for something like an internship, residency or fellowship, select the sponsoring institution.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions:
Include information like the specific degrees (non-abbreviated) and/or areas of focus or specialization (e.g., Bachelor of Science in Biology).

Do not repeat the name of the Education or Training Type (e.g., Fellowship). Do not include "Doctor of Medicine" as the description for the "Medical School" Education or Training Type

field_physician_associations.label: Health Care Professional Memberships
field_physician_associations.name: physician_associations
field_physician_associations.instructions: Examples: Fellow of the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists, American Society of Breast Surgeons, American Burn Association, etc.

field_physician_locations.label: Locations
field_physician_locations.name: physician_locations
field_physician_locations.instructions: These items will be displayed in the order they are entered. You may click and drag to rearrange. Put the provider's primary location first.

field_physician_expertise_tab.label: Related Areas of Expertise

field_physician_expertise.label: Areas of Expertise
field_physician_expertise.name: physician_expertise
field_physician_expertise.instructions: Areas of Expertise are hierarchical. If a child area is included here (e.g., Lung Cancer Care), please also select the parent area (e.g., Cancer Care).

field_physician_condition_treatment_tab.label: Related Conditions and Treatments

field_physician_conditions_cpt.label: Conditions Treated
field_physician_conditions_cpt.name: physician_conditions_cpt
field_physician_conditions_cpt.instructions: Select any conditions this provider treats or diagnoses. These items will be displayed in the order they are entered. You may click and drag to rearrange.

field_physician_treatments_cpt.label: Treatments & Procedures
field_physician_treatments_cpt.name: physician_treatments_cpt
field_physician_treatments_cpt.instructions: Select any treatments or procedures this provider performs or prescribes. These items will be displayed in the order they are entered. You may click and drag to rearrange.

field_physician_clinical_resources.label: Clinical Resources
field_physician_clinical_resources.name: physician_clinical_resources
field_physician_clinical_resources.instructions: Resources will be displayed on the page in the order in which they were published, with the most recently published resources showing first.

field_physician_gmb_tab.label: Google My Business Details

field_physician_schema_gmb_query.label: Does this provider have one or more listings on Google My Business?
field_physician_schema_gmb_query.name: physician_schema_gmb_query

field_physician_gmb_exclude.label: Should this provider be excluded from any bulk imports and updates in Google My Business?
field_physician_gmb_exclude.name: physician_gmb_exclude

field_physician_gmb_cat.label: Google My Business Category
field_physician_gmb_cat.name: physician_gmb_cat
field_physician_gmb_cat.instructions:
Select up to ten categories. Rearrange them so that the first item is the primary category. "Doctor" is a good standard choice, if you cannot find a better option.

For reference, you can view a list of available categories.

field_physician_alternatename.label: Alternate Names for the Provider (alternateName > Text)
field_physician_alternatename.name: physician_alternatename
field_physician_alternatename.instructions: Do not include degrees and credentials in the alternate names.

field_physician_sameas.label: Reference Webpages for the Provider (sameAs > URL)
field_physician_sameas.name: physician_sameas

field_physician_prefix.label: Prefix
field_physician_prefix.name: physician_prefix
field_physician_prefix.instructions: Only select "Dr." if the provider has any of the following degrees: M.D., D.D.S., D.O., DPM or O.D.

field_profile_message.label: Profile Information
field_profile_message.message: This information is designed for department and public websites.

field_physician_academic_short_bio.label: Short Academic Biography
field_physician_academic_short_bio.name: physician_academic_short_bio
field_physician_academic_short_bio.instructions: Limit of 160 characters. Preferred length is at least 110 characters.

choices.129: Donald W. Reynolds Institute on Aging (RIOA)
choices.134: Harvey and Bernice Jones Eye Institute (JEI)

field_physician_clinical_admin_title.label: Clinical Administrative Title
field_physician_clinical_admin_title.name: physician_clinical_admin_title
field_physician_clinical_admin_title.instructions: Both fields are required if you add a row. This is not displayed on the front end at this time.

sub_fields.label: Clinical Administrative Title
sub_fields.name: clinical_admin_title_tax
sub_fields.instructions: Service line director, medical director, nursing director or administrator.
